title: Tesla Supplier Shows Off More Powerful Battery
sub_head: Panasonic looks to sell new product to U.S. EV maker
body:
TOKYOâ€” Tesla Inc. supplier Panasonic Corp. said it has mostly solved the technology challenges with a larger lithium-ion battery that Elon Musk has called the lowest-cost way to power an electric car.
Panasonic on Monday showed off for the first time its 4680 cylindrical battery, which gets its name from being 46 millimeters in diameter and 80 millimeters high. It is larger than previous battery cells Panasonic has supplied to Tesla.
